item.title: Switching to Hyprland
item.description: Hyprland is a dynamic tiling Wayland (a replacement for the X11 window system protocol and architectur) compositor based on wlroots.

item.title: Paradox of Choice
item.description: Introduction # Paradox of choice - why more is less is a book by american psychologist Barry Schawtz where he argues that eliminating consumers choices can greatly reduce indecisiveness and stress for shoppers.
